description.content: The minimum value in the random number range.

documentation.content: Defines the lower bound (inclusive) for the random number generation.

description.content: The maximum value in the random number range.

documentation.content: Defines the upper bound (inclusive) for the random number generation.

description.content: Generates a random number between the specified minimum and maximum values.

documentation.content: Returns a randomly generated number within the given range, inclusive of both minimum and maximum.
